column5: RIG ESV DO SDRL GE been revisiting ghosts of nightmare trades Ive owned U know Im a bull but all have a common thread The charts set up obvious pattern double bottom CH500 min etc slight bounce off that historic low then a 30 drop Followed by analysts rating company less than one quarters earnings Everyone vanishes Usual move from there is 10x but Im burned and hate the stock by then as its in rear view mirror please be cautious and not complacent or your money will vanish
SDRL tradeideascomtickyticky is trading Down Significantly Today Down 7 for the day
